official_title: To remove certain prohibitions to the licensing of a vessel for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States for the vessel ARCTIC SOUNDER.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel.
